# AppVador

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="320"
  height="180"
  type="appvador"
  data-id="7393d415ebe7366b0cc24478c5675ee0"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration semantics, contact [AppVador](http://www.appvador.com/).

### Required Parameters

-   `data-id`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-options`
-   `data-js-type`
-   `data-custom-script-src`
